meanings.definition: The hairs that grow on the edge of the eyelid.
meanings.sent1: Her long eyelashes fluttered as she blinked.
meanings.sent2: She applied mascara to her eyelashes to make them stand out.
meanings.sent3: The spider wished it had eyelashes to protect its eyes from dust.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with hues that matched her eyelashes.
meanings.sent5: The actress's eyelashes were so thick, they cast shadows on her cheeks.

meanings.definition: A single hair of the eyelid.
meanings.sent1: One of her eyelashes fell out while she was washing her face.
meanings.sent2: She found an eyelash on her cheek and made a wish before blowing it away.
meanings.sent3: The eyelash on the doll's face was so tiny, it was almost invisible.
meanings.sent4: The delicate eyelash swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully painted each eyelash on the portrait to capture the subject's gaze.
